description_en: The Tilemap Bar allows editing tilemaps in the Tilemap object from the Layout View . It provides a toolbar with various tools and options, and a view of the current tileset image. The Tilemap Bar Basic usage To add a tilemap and start editing it, follow these steps: Add a Tilemap object to the layout and make sure it is selected Choose the Pencil or Rectangle tool from the Tilemap bar's toolbar Select a tile in the tileset showing in the Tilemap bar Click inside the Tilemap object to start drawi
